BLOCK_LOOKING_AT.desc: Flint is used to make tools

Use an axe to chop. 
Sneak and chop to chop whole tree at once

Use a canteen or a bottle to drink water 
You should filter it, though
Seems cold, perhaps a jacket will help? Or a campfire?
Light fires with a firestarter, kolo?

TOOLTIP.desc:
Look at slot you want to insert held item into 
Light with a firestarter

INFO.desc: Gravel can be found on cliff faces

DIMENSION.desc:
You have Entered the Nether. 
This place is very dangerous. Keep armor, a sword, and a bow handy. 
Also very hot
